title: [SALAH] “Guys! Tolong Jangan Beli Cokelat Snickers” [FALSE] “Guys! Please Don’t Buy Snickers Chocolate Bar” - Cek Fakta
subtitle:
Guys! Tolong jangan beli cokelat Snicker, karena negara lain membuang dan membakar ratusan Snickers karena terkontaminasi (membahayakan kesehatan yang memakan cokelat tersebut).. Jadi untuk orang tua awasi makanan anak-anak kita, Berikan saja mereka makanan sehat untuk bekal sehingga mereka aman.. Tolong. Bagikan!.

Guys! Wag muna kayo bumili ng Snickers Chocolate bar, dahil sa ibang bansa tinapon at sinunog po ang libo libong snickers dahil kontaminado ito na nakakasama sa kalusugan ng makakakain nito.. kaya sa mga magulang po dyan bantayan po natin ang kinakain ng ating mga anak, bigyan na lang po sila ng masustansyang pagkain sa kanilang baon para safe po sila.. pls.Share! | “Guys! Please don’t buy snickers chocolate bar, because of other countries exile and burned thousands of snickers because it is contaminated with the health that can eat it.. So with parents there we look after our children eat, Just give them a healthy food in their allowance so they are safe.. Please. Share!.
author: kalimasada.turnbackhoax.id
vclaim:
